verses.verse: The priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> and his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore shall they have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their brethren: <S%H251><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto them.

And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> due <S%H4941><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them that offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> it be ox <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H518><s%> sheep; <S%H7716><s%> and they shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder, <S%H2220><s%> and the two cheeks, <S%H3895><s%> and the maw. <S%H6896><s%>

The firstfruit <S%H7225><s%> also of thy corn, <S%H1715><s%> of thy wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of thine oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the first <S%H7225><s%> of the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of thy sheep, <S%H6629><s%> shalt thou give <S%H5414><s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> him out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy tribes, <S%H7626><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> him <S%H1931><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a Levite <S%H3881><s%> come <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H259><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> sojourned, <S%H1481><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the desire <S%H185><s%> of his mind <S%H5315><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%>

Then he shall minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> as all <S%H3605><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> do, which stand <S%H5975><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
They shall have like portions <S%H2506><s%> <S%H2506><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> that which cometh of the sale <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4465><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> his patrimony. <S%H1><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of those <S%H1992><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

There shall not <S%H3808><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> among you any one that maketh his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> or that useth <S%H7080><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> or an observer of times, <S%H6049><s%> or an enchanter, <S%H5172><s%> or a witch, <S%H3784><s%>
Or a charmer, <S%H2266><s%> <S%H2267><s%> or a consulter <S%H7592><s%> with familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> or a wizard, <S%H3049><s%> or a necromancer. <S%H1875><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> these things <S%H428><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H1558><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> perfect <S%H8549><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> shalt possess, <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> observers of times, <S%H6049><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> diviners: <S%H7080><s%> but as for thee, <S%H859><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> suffered <S%H5414><s%> thee so <S%H3651><s%> to do.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will raise up <S%H6965><s%> unto thee a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee, of thy brethren, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H251><s%> like unto me; <S%H3644><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him ye shall hearken; <S%H8085><s%>

According to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou desiredst <S%H7592><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let me not <S%H3808><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H853><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> let me see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> that I die <S%H4191><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, They have well <S%H3190><s%> spoken that which <S%H834><s%> they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

I will raise them up <S%H6965><s%> a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> their brethren, <S%H251><s%> like unto thee, <S%H3644><s%> and will put <S%H5414><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I shall command <S%H6680><s%> him.

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that whosoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will require <S%H1875><s%> it of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> him.

But <S%H389><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall presume <S%H2102><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> <S%H853><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak, <S%H1696><s%> or that <S%H834><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> even that <S%H1931><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> thou say <S%H559><s%> in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> How <S%H349><s%> shall we know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

When <S%H834><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> if the thing <S%H1697><s%> follow <S%H1961><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> come to pass, <S%H935><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> spoken, <S%H1696><s%> but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously: <S%H2087><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H1481><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> him.
